---
title: "GISRUK 2024 : University of Leeds"
---

Welcome to the 32nd Annual GIS Research UK Conference. The conference will be hosted at University of Leeds on **9th -- 12th April 2024**.

GISRUK attracts international researchers and practitioners in GIS and related fields to share and discuss the latest advances in spatial computing and analysis. The work presented at GISRUK covers a range of methodological approaches and application areas, including: geographic data science, geocomputation, applied statistics, geography, health, urban and transport planning, crime science.

We welcome papers covering all aspects of GIS, both methodological and applied. There is also a theme for the 2024 conference --  **GIS for public good: data, theory, policy** -- around which keynotes and other activity will be structured.

See the [Call for papers](cfp/) for details on how to submit.

## Key Dates

* Paper submission deadline: ~~Monday 8th January 2024~~ Friday 19th January 2024
* Paper review notifications: ~~Monday 12th February 2024~~ Friday 19th February 2024
* Registration opens: January 2024
* ECR workshops: 9th-10th April 2024
* Conference: 10th-12th April 2024
